categories: Category:Star Wars radio and audio drama voice actors

nodes.text: Orlagh Cassidy (born August 17, 1968) is an American actress who portrays Asajj Ventress in the audiobook Dooku: Jedi Lost. Sean Keane of CNET writer Sean Kane said Cassidy gave the character "a suitably sinister purr and plenty of cynicism". She has also appeared in the Broadway play Present Laughter along with actor Frank Langella, and portrayed the deputy of counterintelligence for the Central Intelligence Agency in the television series Homeland.
